Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay at the cosy hotel Jazz hotel”
Reviews.Author: LSuhr
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a fantastic place, right in the middle of the very exclusive Istanbul...! We enjoyed every second there, the personnel is very kind and service oriented. The rooms are newly renovated and with very good taste!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: simple68
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, really original , nice music and very open employees at this hotel. We will come back here again because it is a quiet place, very clean, good food . Istanbul it is very beutiful night and day so your holliday will be excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay in elegent part of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Tomasz S
Reviews.Content: The Jazz Hotel is modern boutique hotel in value for money price range located in Nisantasi, upscale neighborhood of Istanbul. We've had excellent stay there for 3 nights in mid November. Advantages: - Good location in elegant part of Istanbul, reputable for its fashion stores. It is just 15 minute walk from Taxim Square, but the area is lot quieter and more relaxing than Taxim itself. Just be aware that the location is bit away from Sultanahmet, historical and touristic centre of Istanbul and you will need to take either taxi or metro/tram to get to attractions such as Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and Blue Mosque. - Super-friendly and professional service from English speaking staff. - Nice, modern and comfortable rooms â€“ each featuring different jazz musician. We stay at John Coltrane, No. 62 on the top floor, which is bit smaller than other rooms but has small balcony with nice view over the area (although you canâ€™t see Bosphorus from there). - Tasty continental breakfast with suitable choice - Other services such as transport to/from the airport handled very efficiently and professionally. Disadvantages: - There are not many, really. Perhaps whole property is quite small, which results in bit cramped lifts, corridors. But thatâ€™s not a major problem. - The hotel is located in quite densely built up part of Istanbul and it takes a day or two familiarize how to navigate in the neighborhood. If someone wants to visit with a car, I would say it is not a good idea. - For us it was advantage, but the neighborhood around Hotel Jazz has European/Western feel. If you are after old Orient experience, opt for hotels in Karakoy or Sultanahmet areas. Tip: There is another hotel the Gallery Residence, just 100 meters away, which is run by the same owners. The Gallery Residence - which seems similar to the Jazz Hotel but more suitable for longer term stay - has fitness room and sauna, which guests of the Jazz can use for free.

Reviews.Title: “Again lovely Istanbul,on a very nice hotel and reasonable price!!”
Reviews.Author: HelianaCalmon
Reviews.Content: The Jazz Hotel is located on the very best part of the modern Istanbul and steps away from the Osmanbey subway, and just one metro stop from the Taksim square. VERY kind staff on a small and personalized hotel , with lovely and newly decorated spacious rooms and lots of amenities such as complimentary bottle of water , Turkish delights (Lokum), daily newspaper and slippers. Safe in the room, as well as complimentary wireless and a printer on the room,if needed! Breakfast is also included! Price is really amazing compared to the quality hotels in Istanbul (I stayed on the Ritz Carlton last time) .I will definitely stay at the Jazz Hotel again once back to this lovely city!

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: 485Michelle
Reviews.Content: We had a wondefrul stay at the Jazz Hotel. The rooms are very comfortable and well designed, hotel location is fantastic, the music is great, breakfast at the common table is pleasant and the service - above all - extremely personal. We shall certainly return again!

Reviews.Title: “excelent”
Reviews.Author: christos s
Reviews.Content: We visited Istanbul for the Eurasian Intercontinental Marathon and choosed Jazz hotel for our stay. The hotel was clean, quite, located not on the main road, with friendly staff. Akin at the reception was very assistand and was there for us to solve any problem we might had. Although the hotel was distand from the Sultanahmet at the old city, which is not good for marathoners, a metro station is 2 minutes walk from the hotel and with a conection by tramway you get there quick. Taxim square and Istiklal street is near the hotel just one stop by metro. Nisantasi is a very nice area with few good restaurant near the hotel. We suggest kosebasi kebab restaurant for dinner , 5 minutes walk from the hotel, with traditional recipes from South Anatolia. Just ask Akin at the reception desk.

Reviews.Title: “Innovative”
Reviews.Author: Saitam99
Reviews.Content: You can find in the room everythibg you need including a valanga for your weight. Room Are clean and spacious. I ll certainly be' back. Very good value for money at least compared to' european big cities

Reviews.Title: “Extremely cute and stylish”
Reviews.Author: natalochka
Reviews.Content: This cozy hotel is well located in a respectable district of Istanbul, close to the shopping area and metro station. Its distinguished design sounds in unison with jazz melodies in compliance with its name, making the atmosphere truly comfortable and relaxed. There is a good taste in every detail! The bathroom equipment is new and clean, breakfasts are tasty, and the staff is really professional and friendly. What else do you need to feel at home?:)) PS: Be aware of stupid taxi drivers. They can never find this tiny Bahtiyar Sokak, don't speak english and get confused in one-way traffic. Orientate on Rumeli street that is very close to the hotel or use the metro (Osmanbay station) and enjoy Jazz hotel and beautiful Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “The refined design, good arrangement and the highly professional personnel”
Reviews.Author: Jelena G
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in 20 minutes of walking from the area of Taksim. Numbers cozy, with magnificent possibility of rest and work. The design of hotel pleases not only fans of a jazz, but also judges of rest, tourism and qualitative textiles. But the main riches of hotel - the hospitable, sympathetic and highly professional personnel which has made our rest really unforgettable. Separate gratitude of porter Akim for warm reception, interest to our rest and the invaluable help in the decision of all arising problems. Jelena, Latvia

Reviews.Title: “Everything was great!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ramzess999
Reviews.Content: Thanks for everything.First of all,we really loved Jazz Hotel,especially jazz music in hotel.Interior design of hotel is awesome!!! Rooms are very comfortable.Great thing about this hotel is,the hotel located in Nishantasi,so we really enjoyed of shopping in Nisantasi.I would recommend this hotel to everybody.Thanks

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in a very nice place”
Reviews.Author: K N R
Reviews.Content: We have really enjoyed our stay in this hotel. It is located in a small and quiet street, but not very far from places of interest. The staff is helpful and friendly. Rooms are very clean, comfortable, with a very good view.

Reviews.Title: “Creative theme and exceptionally helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Mohamed S
Reviews.Content: We loved the jazzy theme of the hotel and its location (near the business convention center); but what really made our stay enjoyable were the super helpful and friendly staff - they really did all their best to attend to our convenience.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: katerina133
Reviews.Content: Hotel facilities were everything one would require.The room was very clean, comfortable and spacious . Bathroom excellent. Breakfast was good and good service. Reception staff, were very friendly kind and helpful. All compliments for staff at hotel! katerina Greece

Reviews.Title: “Jazz Hotel is simply great!”
Reviews.Author: IngeAarslev
Reviews.Content: Jazz Hotel is a very cosy hotel with a very polight and helpfull staff. The cleaning is superb. Very nice breakfast. A very nice atmosphere with soft jazz in the speakers, whenever You want it.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay. We would stay again and again.”
Reviews.Author: sarahesk
Reviews.Content: Jazz Hotel is a gorgeous boutique hotel in the heart of the modern-european side of Istanbul. The Jazz Hotel is a peaceful and charming spot in the heart of the european shopping district. Our room was delightful, with modern facilities and a lovely view of this part of the city. The staff at this hotel were amazing to say the least. They were always attentive, friendly and warm. We felt a part of the family after only 8 nights. Having stayed here for a conference and for leisure I can safely say that commuting to all parts of the city was simple. The rooms also had printing facilities which made it easy to continue working while on the other side of the world. Just down the road is the sister hotel Gallery Residence, for which we were also welcomed to use their spa facilities and DVD library, which was an added bonus. This was a wonderful hotel with wonderful staff and we would not hesitate to stay here in the future or to recommend it unreservedly to others. Thanks Jazz Hotel for making Istanbul feel like a home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “charming hotel with amazingly friendy staff and beautifully implemented jazz theme”
Reviews.Author: hajaf0
Reviews.Content: i travelled alone as a woman and recommend this hotel for couples and solo travellers. I was always taken special care of and felt safe (staff took extra effort to make sure i get good taxis and not one of those nasty ones, ripping you off). i loved the room and breakfast room design, room was spacious, all technical equipment was new, in perfect shape. Rooms spotless clean. Great music in all rooms, i was even given a CD of it as a memory. Hotel is very close to subway, 1 station away from Taksim square with zillions of restaurants and a vivid shopping street. breakfast could have more variation, such as fresh fruit, food was rather turkish than international, quality was still excellent. Due to its nature, the hotel is very much suited for romantic trips too...i also enjoyed the free wireless.

Reviews.Title: “very cute, clean and quiet the area is great!”
Reviews.Author: cbonatou
Reviews.Content: the hotel is very clean the romm is very spasious and the people that work there very polite. Breakfast could be better. The area nissandasi is beautiful with nice shops,cafes and restaurants. I totaly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Boutique Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Barboun
Reviews.Content: Hotel located in a nice quite area close to many historic places and close to nightlife. View is nothing special, also reception and lobby area is extremely petite, the rooms have an average size. Staff is really nice and friendly ready to help you any time around the clock. Nice decoration and for sure you will have no complains for the cleaness.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great neighbourhood, great value”
Reviews.Author: cromerty
Reviews.Content: Spent 3 days in this great little hotel in Nisentasi. Warm, comfortable, very friendly staff, great breakfast, comfortable beds, and best of all, in a beautiful, quiet, charming little street in Nisentasi - on of the most upmarket neighbourhoods in Istanbul. Lots of great little eateries nearby and wonderful shopping. We paid 404 euros for 4 nights which is incredible value for one of the worlds top 10 cities. Would wholeheartedly recommend again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Just all you need”
Reviews.Author: larin83
Reviews.Content: During our trip this hotel gave all we got; a comfortable room,a luxury bath, jazz music in the room, even an iron was there.The location was great.Thanks for everything

Reviews.Title: “Great "jazz" experience”
Reviews.Author: 3v1
Reviews.Content: great as far as cleanliness is concerned. friendly staff but not fluent in english. 20' walk to the city centre (taxim square), not near a metro station decent breakfast

Reviews.Title: “"jazz" perfect!!!”
Reviews.Author: annadiama
Reviews.Content: What to say... a very pleasant stay,very kind and elegand staff...it was all "jazz" perfect!! many thanx to all of u!

Reviews.Title: “Impecable aesthetics, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: s_kapoulas
Reviews.Content: Polite and TOLERANT personel ready to help with any of our more or less "special" requests. Amazing aesthetics in all three rooms we used - each one with different internal design. Nice music (of course).Small number of rooms which is always a plus cause makes the relationship with the staff less formal. Conveniently located nearby the metro station.

Reviews.Title: “Very good stay! I'd have preferred to stay for leisure, not for business...”
Reviews.Author: dario83
Reviews.Content: Excellent stylish rooms with all services, but too much light during the night. Wireless network not working at the best. Very good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “I enjoyed you hospitality”
Reviews.Author: silviaIst
Reviews.Content: Everything is good (I'm still your guest!). The staff is really friendly.. sometimes I feel like home.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: heratux
Reviews.Content: Very beautiful hotel, all is new and the service is very good.. you have all confort in the room.. very clean

Reviews.Title: “Not up to par”
Reviews.Author: DC_Travel8
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my girlfriend for 4 days. it was extremely difficult for all of the taxis to find this hotel due to this being a new hotel and because all of the roads leading to the hotel were either under construction the entire time or blocked by various parked cars. Once we finding the hotel after our daily ventures we would have to be let out a block away and walk through dirt roads and unpaved sidewalks the remaining way to the hotel due to the previously mentioned conditions. The hotel dÃ©cor is extremely nice from the outside, lobby, hallway (very small), elevator (even smaller), and the decor of the room (very small as well) all very nice. The service from the very few staff members was exceptional, and they were very tentative to our needs. Other than the Decor and the hospitality of the 3 or 4 staff members, I have nothing else good to say about this hotel. The room was extremely small, the bed was extremely uncomfortable, there was construction noise every morning as well as through out the day, the refrigerator was very small and barely kept its contents above room temperature. Upon our arrival to a very hot and stuffy hotel room, we set the air conditioner on 18 degrees Celsius and it blew minimal. The room was h until the second day of our trip. There was no ice to be found at the hotel. When we requested ice to chill our room tempeture drinks out of the fridge we were brought a cup of ice. One of the staff was kind enough to go to the local market and purchase us ice the second day, after which we just purchased our own ice daily. There were over 800 channels on the television but only 3 channels were in English and 2 of them only played English programs for a few hours in the evening and a hour or two in the mornings. The floors in the room were incredibly slippery, both my girl friend and I almost slipped and fell at least 6 times. Just didnâ€™t like this hotel at all, had it not been for the staff who tried as much as they could to help us and the fact that we would only be there 4 nights we would have checked out and went to another hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: Jazz Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Bahtiyar Sokak No: 1, Istanbul 34371, Turkey
